translations.Welcome to the Graasp App Starter Kit: Welcome to the Graasp App Starter Kit
translations.Name: Name
translations.ClickPerButton: Number of clicks per possible interaction
translations.TimelineTitle: Timeline of users interactivities in the simulation
translations.VisitorsTooltip: Unique visitors who interacted with the simulation.
translations.MedianTrialsTooltip: A trial corresponds to a continuous session during which the user interacts with the simulation. For example, 2 trials correspond to the user interacting once, then reconnecting a moment later (minutes, hours, days, ...) and interacting again with the simulation.
translations.RatingsTooltip: Users can rate the simulation from 0 to 5 in Player mode.
translations.UnityTips0: In the parameters below, each position can be modified in relation to the X,Y,Z reference system shown in the image.
translations.UnityTips1: The application is designed so that, by default, the box is at the origin, at point (0,0,0), and the camera at position (0, -8, 6.5) in space.
translations.UnityTips2: In the simulation, rotations are represented by Euler angles in world space. Consequently, a rotation is described by three angle values for the X, Y and Z axes, the reference frame shown in the image above.
translations.TooltipIsLockedOnTarget: Does the camera follow the physical object?
translations.ShowTrace: Box path is active on simulation start
translations.TooltipVelocity: Can the velocity vector be dragged by the user
translations.IsPushActive: Pushing force is active on simulation start
translations.FrictionStaticIsInteractive: Coefficient of static friction can be modified
translations.FrictionKineticIsInteractive: Coefficient of dynamic friction can be modified
translations.RatingQuestion: Do you find the simulation useful?
